body_html:
@Davidnet, @peterlee0127

As a part of a separate issue, I'll be looking into updating this so that we

  1. don't rely on this Google-only macro for TX2
  2. this code (which cannot compile on either the Jetson TX1 or TX2)

Seeing if there are any specific macros we can use so that gcc / llvm don't include this code for TX1 / TX2.

body:
@Davidnet, @peterlee0127 

As a part of a separate issue, I'll be looking into updating this so that we
1. don't rely on this Google-only macro for TX2
2. this code (which cannot compile on either the Jetson TX1 or TX2) 

Seeing if there are any specific macros we can use so that gcc / llvm don't include this code for TX1 / TX2.
